questions.question: 1. Which of the followings are indeterminate structure ?

answers.c: 3 member of the portal in the fixity at bottom of columns

answers.a: Can be analyzed using compatibility equation only
answers.b: Can be analyzed using compatibility equations and equations of static equilibrium
answers.c: Can be analyzed using static equilibrium equations only

explanations.b: Statically indeterminate structures Can be analyzed using compatibility equations and equations of static equilibrium

questions.question: 3. Which of the following conditions must be satisfied for both elastic and plastic method of analysis of indeterminate structures?

explanations.b: Equilibrium condition must be satisfied for both elastic and plastic method of analysis of indeterminate structures.

questions.question: 4. A determinate truss should satisfy the relations ________

explanations.a: A determinate truss should satisfy the relations M = 2J-3

questions.question: 5. . If the structure cannot be analyzed for external and internal reactions using equilibrium conditions alone, such structure is ______

explanations.d: Indeterminate structure cannot be analyzed for external and internal reactions using equilibrium conditions only.
